manuscript.description: The relative path to the manuscript folder.

formats.description: An array of formats you want to print your book in (epub only as of now).

coverPath.description: The path to the book cover (jpg, png).

tocInTOC.description: (Default true) Whether to show TOC entry in the reader's Table of Contents; only for EPUB2.

numberChaptersInTOC.description: (Default false) Whether to number the items in the Table of Contents.

prependChapterTitles.description: (Default true) Whether to automatically number entries in TOC.

lang.description: (Defaults to en) The book's language as an ISO language code.

css.description: A CSS string that overrides default styles.

epubVersion.description: (Default 3) Either 3 or 2. The release version of EPUB to render your book to.

fetchTimeout.description: (Default 2000) Timeout time for requests, in milliseconds; Browsers need to support AbortController and signals for this to work.

retryTimes.description: (Default 3) How many times to retry fetching resources.

batchSize.description: (Default 100) The size of the batches to use when downloading files.

ignoreFailedDownloads.description: (Default false) Instead of throwing, emit a warning and write an empty file if a font or image fails to download.

verbose.description: (Default false) Whether to log progress messages; If a function is provided, the first argument will either be 'log' or 'warn'.
